TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDsigXsltTransform extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform

summary.span: 表示由 W3C 定义的数字签名 XSLT 转换。

span.span: Represents the XSLT transform for a digital signature as defined by the W3C.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许你解决使用 XSLT 转换的 XML 文档。The class allows you to address an XML document using an XSLT transformation. 此类使用 XSLT 将转换为其他你想要签名或加密的 XML 节点的 XML 节点。This class uses XSLT to transform XML nodes into other XML nodes that you want to sign or encrypt. 使用类签名或加密的使用 XSLT 转换的 XML 文档的特定部分。Use the class to sign or encrypt specific parts of an XML document using an XSLT transformation. 描述的统一资源标识符 (URI)类定义由字段。The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the class is defined by the field. 有关 XSLT 转换的详细信息，请参阅部分 6.6.5 XMLDSIG 规范，这是可从在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ W3C。For more information about the XSLT transform, see Section 6.6.5 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何进行签名和验证 XML 文档使用通过封装签名的类。The first code example shows how to sign and verify an XML document using the class with an envelope signature. 第二个代码示例演示如何使用的成员类。The second code example demonstrates how to use members of the class. **示例 #1****Example #1** [!code-cpp[Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigXsltTransform/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigXsltTransform/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XmlDsigXsltTransform/VB/sample.vb#1)] **示例 #2****Example #2** [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform/CPP/members.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform/CS/members.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform/VB/members.vb#2)]

summary.span: 返回 对象的参数的 XML 表示形式，适合以 XMLDSIG 元素的子元素的形式来包含这些参数。

span.span: Returns an XML representation of the parameters of the object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG element.

returns.span: XML 节点的列表，这些节点表示描述 XMLDSIG 元素中当前 对象所需的特定于转换的内容。

span.span: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current object in an XMLDSIG element.
